Seems to be working well. Controls are saving, time/date is showing on the saves, all boots up without issue.
Quicksaves still won't overwrite themselves unless you delete the previous one manually.
Oh it's just the save time that won't update, the file itself will.

Thanks. This also fixed a bug I was having where I couldn't play in full screen. 

I also made sure to reinstall the game first, instead of just overwriting skidrow's crack, I'd suggest to do the same.
Geez, should I use RLD or FLT Proper? This Scene War is confusing the hell out of me! haha

@goall: Not updating the time/date of save is a crucial fault since the game does not let you NAME saves.
The only way to tell them apart is by the time/date...

Reloading random saves sucks.

However, what I have taken to doing is never overwriting, instead i manually create new saves and then delete the old ones
Anyway to replace the FLT crack with this while still keeping save games?
i dont understand, how do i install the crack? i have the game and mounted it and installed it. what do i do with this?

In order to migrate saves from the skidrow/FLT crack you need to go to:
C:Users***AppDataLocalFLTSteam205100remote
and copy all the files to:
C:ProgramDataRELOADED***205100storage

This version fixed the missing date/time on saves, but it seems the actual times gets messed up after a few saves as well. It still registers as something, just that my autosave from now read the correct time, while my just now new save had a time about two hours ago.

What is the issue here?
Flawless! Thanks Gh0stNet!
Works great with 3DM.

@l3fg8snj: This happens because you chose to "overwrite" an existing save. DON'T DO THAT.

Delete the save and then create a new save to avoid that problem.

@Surre48
I had the same problem, the crack and the other 2 files that are with this downlad, has to be put in the same folder as where the regular dishonored game was at. For me it was C:Program Files (x86)DishonoredBinariesWin32. But of course I have gotten the 3DM version. Hope this helps.

**** Save Location******

C:Documents and SettingsAll UsersApplication DataRELOADEDRLD!205100
